About

Hello!

Let me introduce myself.

My name is Bryan, the owner and principal technician at Rodgers Auto Repair.

I am an ASE Certified Master Technician with over 15 years of experience maintaining and repairing automobiles of all makes and models.

I pride myself in honest affordable quality workmanship.
